# Hypr MCP - Model Context Protocol Server Hosting, Gateway, Analytics & Security

## Purpose

Hypr MCP helps companies deploying and managing Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers.

## Key Features

- **Serverless Architecture**: Deploy MCP servers without managing infrastructure
- **Authentication & Security**: Built-in authentication system for secure MCP server access
- **Easy Integration**: Compatible with Claude Desktop and other MCP clients
- **Scalable**: Automatically scales based on demand
- **Developer-Friendly**: Simple deployment process and comprehensive documentation
- **Unified MCP**: Create a unified MCP server that combines multiple tools into a single endpoint

## Use Cases

- Deploy custom MCP servers for your AI applications
- Integrate databases, APIs, and tools with AI assistants
- Build scalable AI workflows with secure authentication
- Create reusable MCP server templates for common integrations
